channel.title: Classes that should be in the game but aren't because of the theme
channel.description:
Joke classes cause I'm bored
Astronaunt Passive-There is no gravity here-Immune to occupation and redirection. Passive-Spacesuit-Immune to death once Day ability-Blast Off-Because you are blasting off your rocket into space the day ends-Automatically activates upon completion of your goal. Night ability-Gather Resources-Gather stuff for your rocket from someone by occupying them-Unlimited Uses (you get one) Night ability 2-Yes i need those-Gather resources for your rocket from everyone who visits you. Though you may of had to threaten them, everyone who visited you will die in 2 days if not healed due to bleed. 1 for every person who visits you-1 use Goal-Get 10 resources
Come on people make more classes

item.title: Classes that should be in the game but aren't because of the theme
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
Anime Lion

Anime Special

Passive 1: Anime ~ You are immune to everything

Night Ability 1: Eat Rainbow Chocolate ~ Eat rainbow chocolate. You will become a rainbow lion killing everyone except yourself and neuts.

Goal ~ Become rainbow lion to kill everyone. (Basically NK)

Is this good?

Read full topic

item.title: Classes that should be in the game but aren't because of the theme

item.description:
Joke classes cause I’m bored

Astronaunt
Passive-There is no gravity here-Immune to occupation and redirection.
Passive-Spacesuit-Immune to death once
Day ability-Blast Off-Because you are blasting off your rocket into space the day ends-Automatically activates upon completion of your goal.
Night ability-Gather Resources-Gather stuff for your rocket from someone by occupying them-Unlimited Uses (you get one)
Night ability 2-Yes i need those-Gather resources for your rocket from everyone who visits you. Though you may of had to threaten them, everyone who visited you will die in 2 days if not healed due to bleed. 1 for every person who visits you-1 use
Goal-Get 10 resources

Come on people make more classes
